specifications.name: common
specifications.title: Common Information Model
specifications.summary: Information model containing common concepts, including the archetype-enabling `LOCATABLE` class, party references, audits and attestations, change control, and authored resources.

specifications.name: data_structures
specifications.title: Data Structures Information Model
specifications.description: openEHR Data Structures Information Model specification
specifications.summary: Information model of data structures, incuding a powerful model of time-series data.
specifications.keywords: EHR, data structures, reference model, openehr

specifications.name: data_types
specifications.title: Data Types Information Model
specifications.description: openEHR Data Types Information Model specification
specifications.summary: Information model of data types, including quantities, date/times, plain and coded text, time specification, multimedia and URIs.

specifications.name: support
specifications.title: Support Information Model
specifications.summary: Support model defining identifiers, assumed types, and terminology interface specification used in the rest of the IMs.
specifications.keywords: identifiers, primitive types, reference model, openehr

specifications.name: integration
specifications.title: Integration Information Model
specifications.summary: Information model for representing legacy data is a free-form Entry type for implementing integration solutions.

specifications.name: ehr_extract
specifications.title: EHR Extract Information Model
specifications.description: openEHR EHR Extract Information Model specification
specifications.summary: The information model of the EHR Extract, which is a serilialisation of content from an EHR.
